data.text: @SpencerBownas Hello, please send us a DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@Cory_Warfield In order for us to review and provide you with adequate assistance, it is necessary that you send us by DM the information that we have previously requested. We stay tuned.

@guido_cc Hola, ten presente que nuestras tarifas están sujetas a cambios y disponibilidad, que dado a la moneda evaluada, impuesto, entre otros, los precios de cada país son correspondientes a variación. Saludos.

@Cory_Warfield Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation.  We stay tuned.

data.text: @koowha0037 Hello, to protect the security of your personal data, we suggest you hide your comment and send us your data through DM, so we can help you. We are waiting for you. Regards.

@pwolef63 Peter, in order to help you, you can provide us the confirmation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and first and last passenger name, send us this information by inbox. Regards
@Bittick David, in order to assist you, we need that you provide us a number case, reservation code and first and last name
@siddakid17 Hi, to help you with your request please send us a message via DM and explain to us the situation, regards.
@tortoyo Hello, please send us by DM your email to check this further. We look forward to hearing from you. Regards-
@amlaaar Hello, we are pleased to greet you, could you please give us by DM more details of your request. Regards.
@andrejunior76 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@daniel52990 Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. We stay tuned.

@VICALMEIDA071 We couldn't find any request associated with the case number you've sent us. Please verify the information or DM us the email address that was used to open the case. We look forward to your response.
@GroupLambro Hello, we have sent you a DM with the solution to your request. Kind regards.

@GroupLambro Hello, we can assist you thought this means, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. Also, let your know your doubt or request. We stay tuned.
@VICALMEIDA071 Hi Victoria, to help you with your request we need your case number? Regards
@ctous2021 Hi, we've sent you a private message. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: We inform you that due to the consequences caused by Hurricane Ian, our flights to/from Orlando and Miami on September 29th and 30th could be affected. More information at https://t.co/wvyP0bysKa https://t.co/tTFnzxSr5B
@Eustacia_Vye_ Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@SergioD06594016 Mixed breeds are allowed in our flights, to assist you we need to verify your reservation information to make sure we meet all the requirements to request the service. We have written you a message to the DM. Please reply to that message with the requested information.
@jv_becker Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: We inform you that due to the consequences caused by Hurricane Ian, our flights to/from Orlando and Miami on September 27th and 28th could be affected, we recommend you check your flight status at My Trips. https://t.co/llkH7Sd4Ep

@nanos2106 Hola, tu caso ya se ha evaluado varias veces y debemos de mantener la respuesta inicial, ya que debemos de tener una política uniforme con todos nuestros pasajeros. Esperamos poder asistirte de una manera más oportuna en una próxima ocasión.
@nanos2106 Entendemos lo que nos informas, sin embargo, si no cuentas con un recibo de pago es complejo poder asistirte. Feliz día.

@nanos2106 Hemos verificado y el día de hoy te brindamos una respuesta definitiva sobre tu caso, aunque nos encantaría ayudarte en esta ocasión no es posible. Por lo que debemos mantener nuestra postura y no es posible ofrecerte otra alternativa. Saludos.
@nanos2106 Hola, para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español, inglés o portugués) para comunicarnos. Saludos.

@alexpapadopulos Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@illmatic_TJ Hi, please let us know more details via DM. We stay tuned.

@RTfrann Hi, we can assist you through this means, just DM us the details of your inquiry along with the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to hearing from you.
@babycowcat Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@Kathryn_jmalone Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 number) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@xxiv_que Hi , in order to assist you, please send us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@thebied Hi, please let us know more details via DM or your case number. We stay tuned.
@SKatie21 Hello, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 number) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@GiantLifestyle1 Hi, please send us via DM the full name of the passenger, email address, ID or passport number and the selected flights and dates. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@thebied Hello, in order to provide you with proper assistance, please send us by inbox your Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), along with the full name of the passenger and also your email. Regards.
@Gdrny1 Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@carliemcguire You can provide us with the information via DM. We'll stay tuned.

data.text: @carliemcguire Hello, on our website there's an official announcement https://t.co/VwBP92Kkm6. If you have a reservation on this route, you can provide us with your booking code and the full name of the passenger. Kind regards.
@NutritionHannah Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.
@DerekBathrick Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us DM with the details of your request. We stay tuned.
@thejoehiggs Please send us a DM with your reservation code, the full name of the passenger in the reservation and your email address. We will be waiting for your reply.
@thejoehiggs Hello, please send us a DM with your case number to check this matter further. We stay tuned.

@Tahnee_T Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@josea_fern Hola, coméntanos mayor detalle de lo sucedido vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@Eustacia_Vye_ Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via DM the associated case number to carry out the respective validations. Regards.
@CoxaCwb Hello, at the moment we do not have direct flights on this route, however, if the route is activated with direct flight, we will let you know through all our networks. Best regards.
@pristesslill Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.

@GabiPasqualin Hello, please provide us with more details about your inquiry. Please let us know if you have a case number regarding your luggage via DM. Thank you for writing to us. We look forward to hearing from you. Regards.
@matheusrgb Hi , in order to assist you, please send us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@selmasaravia Hello, we hope you are doing well, in order to assist you please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@Johnnie_Howie_ Hi, please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.
@EricLOlofson Hello, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.

@sincerelyjorge Hello, please send us by inbox in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code (if applicable) to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@dianavelal Te hemos escrito por DM. Saludos.

@dianavelal Diana, hemos validado tu reserva y no permite cambios ni antes ni después de la salida del vuelo, vemos que el estado del vuelo estaba a tiempo, adicional para respetarte el vuelo de regreso debiste informas antes de la salida del primero vuelo. Saludos.
@dianavelal Hola Diana, envíanos al DM cuál es el código de tu reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) y nombre completo de quien viaja. Estaremos pendientes de tu respuesta. Saludos.
@Danielvargasdg9 Hola Daniel, de acuerdo estaremos atentos a cualquier novedad que desees consultar vía DM. Saludos.
@antonieta_cl Hello, we inform you that we have already given you an answer to your case through the resolution of this. Best regards.
@Danielvargasdg9 Hola Daniel, para poder asistirte indícanos cuál es tu consulta. Quedamos atentos.
@yanobasta Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.
@almerylonlo Hola, con el fin de darte asistencia, por favor envíanos más detalles acerca de la situación.  Puedes escribirnos por DM (mensaje directo).  Estaremos atentos.
@Estefyperez Te escribimos vía DM. Quedamos atentos.

@imnoangel76 Hi, in order to make the respective validations , please send us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits), the full name of the passenger, the email and phone number. We look forward to your response.
@Estefyperez Hola, para poder ayudarte bríndanos tu código de reserva, vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@NutritionHannah Hello, In order to assist you, please send us your reservation code and passenger's full name via DM. Thank you for writing to us. We stay tuned. Regards.
@TimMichaelOC Hello, please send us more details by DM along with your reservation code or ticket number and the full name of the passenger. We will stay tuned.

@Thierryff Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via DM the associated case number (if you have one) or booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations.
@prematwit Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@Melo_Owtlaw Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.
@chavezjose We have already sent you a private message.
@Joeypr91 Hello Joseph, of course, please provide us your case number, booking code and full name through DM, we will be glad to assist you with.

@marisurueda Hello, in order to provide you with proper assistance, please tell us by DM your Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), along with the full name of the passenger and also your email. Regards.
@CliftonB Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.
@chicodeleclerc Hola, ¿cómo te podemos ayudar?

@lo_rene Hi, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@CliftonB Then, please select the one that allows you to be logged in. Regards.
@CliftonB You can choose any of the two options, we suggest you choose according to the country where you are located. Regards.
@CliftonB Hi, we hope you are doing well. We can assist you through this channel, please send us via DM in a detail way your doubts and concerns to continue. Regards.
@ChelRogerson Hello, please message us through DM we will assist you with. Kind regards.

@Inkaman Hi, we ask you to delete browser history and the cookies, and try to register one more time or try to use a different browser or device (preferably a computer). In case the problem still persists, please DM us your email address, full name and ID (type, number). Regards.
@bmannheim Hello, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.

@judyiromano Hi, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code (6 upper letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@holly_atkins Hi, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@MarciaSchuck1 Hola, validamos que se a través de tu caso se te ha pedido información adicional para completar tu solicitud. Te pedimos por favor enviarla validando los datos correctos. Recuerda que si deseas mayor atención, podemos asistirte vía DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@neto_isnard Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@prematwit Hi, we have sent you a DM
@JBGN Hola Juan, si deseas asistencia puedes indicarnos por este medio. Quedamos atentos.
@peterjkearney We apologise for the issue you had with our website, we kindly ask you to contact us for any further issue or request. Kind regards.
@peterjkearney Hello Peter, tell us through DM what is the issue that you have with the website. We stay tuned.

data.text: Open your window to the world, leaving on the ground all the 'but' that limit you and change them to the 'why not?' that make you fly high. ✈️🌎 Find out more https://t.co/wXkKHPSwSJ https://t.co/cm1715q7dy

@chavezjose Hi, we have sent you a DM. We stay tuned.

@JuliaGall7 Hello, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@Jax_Monet Hello, to review please tell us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. We will stay tuned.
@DavidH_CHV Hi, we have contact you to the contact number registered. We will be sending you more details via email. We appreciate your patience.
